data.actual_result: The voice channel shows that no one is connected
data.expected_result: The voice channel shows that the other user is connected
data.short_description: Voice channel connected users list doesn't update when joining server
data.steps_to_repro: - Have another user (or an alt on another device) create a server and connect to the voice channel in the server - Have the other user send you an instant invite - Look at the voice channel the other user connected to
